name: Super Monkey Ball 2
description: Super Monkey Ball 2 (スーパーモンキーボール2, Sūpā Monkī Bōru Tsū) is a platform/party video game developed by Amusement Vision and published by Sega in 2002 for the GameCube. It is the second installment in the Super Monkey Ball series, and the first installment to have a story-line and to be released exclusively on a home console.
